name: Too Far Gone
description:
From the developer of The Long Road Back, One Night Too Many and Ward 17 comes a brand new horrific experience - You are Subject 11. You're name? You're life? Expendable, or at least that's what those who ran this cursed asylum would lead you to believe, but what can even be believed anymore? Try the game, and discover for yourself... 

In this short horror game, there are FOUR different endings...

Controls/Guide:

W,A,S,D - To move

ESC - To quit at any time

Walk over items/Doors to interact

Approach and look at books/Journals to read 

Left mouse button  - To use special item

Development Info - Please Read

This will be my last short game like this for a while, as I will be working on my main project - Retrowave '84, over the next year or two. After working on The Long Road Back (my previous full length title) for a year, I wanted to briefly go back to my roots, before resuming my main long term independent project (Retrowave '84), the result was this game - Too Far Gone...
